name: estuarine
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to an estuary (= the wide part of a river at the place where it joins the sea): estuarine species She is an authority on estuarine ecology. See
estuary
More examplesFewer examplesThese scientists have concentrated their research on estuarine habitats.Fluctuation of water levels has an ongoing effect on estuarine ecosystems.The estuarine delta is filled with marshes and migrating birds.
